title: The SQL DROP TABLE Statement
text: The DROP TABLE statement is used to drop an existing table in a database.

Note: Be careful before dropping a table. Deleting a 
table will result in loss of complete information stored in the table!

title: SQL DROP TABLE Example
text: The following SQL statement drops the existing table "Shippers":

title: SQL TRUNCATE TABLE
text:
The TRUNCATE TABLE statement is used to delete the data inside a table, but 
not the table itself.
